subject: Basketball (College)
Sneakers
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Those hues of the Irish’s sneakers have streaked across basketball courts over the last two and a half weeks, offending traditionalists, clashing with the team’s gold jerseys and blinding viewers at home.
snippet: Those hues of the Irish’s sneakers have streaked across basketball courts over the last two and a half weeks, offending traditionalists, clashing with the team’s gold jerseys and blinding viewers at home.
